headline: BD Stock Down Despite Monitoring Platform Launch to Boost Patient Care
summary: BDX's AI-based advanced hemodynamic monitoring platform is likely to aid clinicians to address blood flow instability and pressure in critical situations and improve patient outcomes.

raw.headline: BD Stock Down Despite Monitoring Platform Launch to Boost Patient Care
raw.summary: BDX's AI-based advanced hemodynamic monitoring platform is likely to aid clinicians to address blood flow instability and pressure in critical situations and improve patient outcomes.

headline: BD introduces AI-based haemodynamic monitoring platform
summary: The platform comprises Acumen Hypotension Prediction Index software to predict potential low blood pressure events.

raw.headline: BD introduces AI-based haemodynamic monitoring platform
raw.summary: The platform comprises Acumen Hypotension Prediction Index software to predict potential low blood pressure events.
